impact-statement: Genome wide analysis reveals that many transcripts are localized in cells of the ovary and that the localization status of mRNAs changes over time and in different cell types.

contribution.con1: HJ, Designed and performed the experiments, Participated in the bioinformatics analysis, Wrote the manuscript
contribution.con2: VS, Designed and performed most bioinformatic analyses including mapping, Quantification of RNAseq and 3Pseq reads, Statistical analysis of gene architecture features

contribution.con4: PM, Performed the 8000 96-well in situ hybridizations
contribution.con5: SS, Designed an image processing script to enhance analysis of fluorescent image data
contribution.con6: PT, Co-designed the study, Performed cross-tissue analysis, Developed database and website, Co-wrote the manuscript
